thread.title: Craig David guested with Major Lazer and everyone went mad - Music
thread.title_full: Craig David guested with Major Lazer and everyone went mad - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Sam Warner
title: Craig David guested with Major Lazer and everyone went mad - Music
text: Craig David made a special appearance with Major Lazer at their London gig last night, performing his classic 2000 hit 'Fill Me In'.The group were performing at Alexandra Palace and gave the crowd a well-received surprise.Going on differently for 2016!!! @majorlazer @diplo #alexandrapalace #Lit pic.twitter.com/XIv0QxhDug— Craig David (@CraigDavid) October 17, 2015After performing Jack Ü's (Diplo from Major Lazer and Skrillex) Justin Bieber-featuring hit 'Where Are Ü Now?', they invited David onstage.The star performed his hit 'Fill Me In' acappella before it was remixed with the Bieber featuring song. © Getty Images / Ollie Millington/Redferns Although most people thought that the '7 Days' singer had vanished into obscurity, he has appeared more in the media recently.In August he said that he wanted to make music with Kasabian, and in 2010 he released an album called Signed Sealed Delivered.Major Lazer helped revive Justin Bieber's career, so who knows? Let's hope that Bo' Selecta makes a comeback at the same time though.Watch the video for 'Fill Me In' below:
